about_the_game:
Infinite monkeys with infinite typewriters will eventually write Shakespeare... right? Find out in this cozy automation idler! Strategically place different kinds of monkeys with typewriters then level them up as you type longer and longer words!

SMASH THAT KEYBOARD

Place a typewriter next to a monkey so they can start using it! They'll just press random letters but eventually they're bound to stumble across a real word...

SELF-PUBLISHED AUTHOR

Earn money for each word you type, then use the money to upgrade your monkeys! Buy more monkeys and more typewriters so you can expand your literary horizons!

TO THINE OWN MONKEY BE TRUE

Upgrade your monkeys enough to eventually write the works of Shakespeare!

Featuring:

  • Multiple species of monkeys and apes!

  • Plenty of upgrades!

  • Strategic monkey placement!

  • Endless replayability!

  • Idle elements, the monkeys keep typing while you sleep!

name: Typewriter Monkeys

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM / DirectX 10+ support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card

short_description: Infinite monkeys with infinite typewriters will eventually write Shakespeare... right? Find out in this cozy automation idler! Strategically place different kinds of monkeys with typewriters then level them up as you type longer and longer words!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
